Player History
Drafted in 12th round, 181st overall pick, by Montreal in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/2015, off Terry Katz (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/10/2015, off James Buono (STL)...
Won Gold Glove at Leftfield in 2016...
Injured on 7/26/2017 with a Broken Ribs, out for 4-5 weeks...
Traded from Montreal to Philadelphia on 3/2/2018 (Going to MON: SS Jay Muff. Going to PHI: RF Roger Young)...
